originalTitle: Russian 'pick-up artist' accused of secretly filming women in Ghana
title: Russian 'pick-up artist' accused of secretly filming women in Ghana
content: Ghana has called on Russia to extradite the man, who is accused of recording sexual encounters without consent.

originalTitle: Motorbike raids on villages kill dozens in Nigeria
title: Motorbike raids on villages kill dozens in Nigeria
content: Armed men shot locals dead, set homes alight and abducted an "undetermined" number of people in Niger State.

originalTitle: Planned US-funded baby vaccine trial in Guinea-Bissau blasted by WHO
title: Planned US-funded baby vaccine trial in Guinea-Bissau blasted by WHO
content: Giving some newborns in Guinea-Bissau an established hepatitis B treatment but not others is "unethical", it says.

originalTitle: At least 11 Palestinians killed in Israeli attacks across Gaza
title: At least 11 Palestinians killed in Israeli attacks across Gaza
content: US President Donald Trump says that the first meeting of his newly created 'Board of Peace' will take place on Thursday.

originalTitle: Gaza mother’s grim ordeal: A search for missing son among mutilated bodies
title: Gaza mother’s grim ordeal: A search for missing son among mutilated bodies
content: Gaza families seek closure as they search for loved ones among bodies returned by Israel under 'ceasefire' deal.

title: Is Trumpism losing steam?
content: As Trumpism forces both major US parties to wonder what they stand for, experts weigh in on November election prospects.

originalTitle: Ukraine's ex-energy minister detained while attempting to leave country
title: Ukraine's ex-energy minister detained while attempting to leave country
content: His detention comes as he faces legal proceedings after being dismissed in a corruption scandal.

originalTitle: FBI analysing recovered glove that appears to match those worn in Guthrie suspect video
title: FBI analysing recovered glove that appears to match those worn in Guthrie suspect video
content: The FBI says it recovered a DNA sample from the glove, which was found in a field a few miles from Guthrie's home.

originalTitle: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
title: Iran ready to discuss compromises to reach nuclear deal, minister tells BBC in Tehran
content: Majid Takht-Ravanchi, Iran's deputy foreign minister, tells the BBC's Lyse Doucet that the ball was "in America's court to prove that they want to do a deal".

originalTitle: The big VAR debate: with, without or change its scope?
title: The big VAR debate: with, without or change its scope?
content: After a weekend of FA Cup action without VAR, BBC Sport ask managers, fans and pundits whether the game needs technology - and what needs to change.

originalTitle: 183 team changes in 14 ties - but does it really matter for the FA Cup?
title: 183 team changes in 14 ties - but does it really matter for the FA Cup?
content: Does 183 team changes in 14 ties devalue the FA Cup? Chief football writer Phil McNulty insists the cup retains its old magic.

originalTitle: The curious case of Chermiti in Rohl's Rangers revolution
title: The curious case of Chermiti in Rohl's Rangers revolution
content: BBC Scotland looks at Youssef Chermiti's impact for Rangers against Hearts and beyond.
